text: Are kꞌo ri Jesús pa ri tinimit Betania pa rachoch ri Simón, ri kabꞌix chꞌaꞌk achi che, xopan jun ixoq rukꞌaꞌm bꞌik jun kꞌokꞌ laj kunabꞌal.14:3 Ri alabastro jun abꞌaj ri sibꞌalaj chꞌuchꞌuj. Are waꞌ ri kabꞌan limeꞌt rukꞌ kaya kꞌokꞌ taq kunabꞌal chupam. ri bꞌantal che jun ri qꞌayes ubꞌiꞌ nardo, ri sibꞌalaj paqal rajil. Ri ixoq xupaxij ri kꞌolibꞌal ri kꞌo wi bꞌik ri kunabꞌal, kꞌa te riꞌ xuqꞌij pa ujolom ri Jesús.14:3 Ri nardo are jun kiꞌ uwaꞌl jun cheꞌ ri kꞌo pa ri tinimit India, xa kꞌu rumal che ri naj kape wi rumal riꞌ sibꞌalaj paqal rajil, yaktal pa jun limeꞌt ri man rech man xaq ta katixik.
